note.p: Civil servant and judge in India. Appointed registrar of the Bombay high court, 1863, district judge, Canara, 1866; judicial commissioner, Sind, 1868; high court judge, Bombay, 1873–86. University teacher in Indian law, Cambridge, 1895–1907; reader in Indian and Islamic law, 1901–7. Knighted, 1888.
